alert.note: Alert for Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 8:12AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rankin, northeastern Simpson and Smith Counties through 845 AM CST... At 812 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Martinville, or near Magee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... White Oak around 820 AM CST. Raleigh around 830 AM CST. Burns around 840 AM CST. Pineville around 845 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sylvarena, Polkville and Puckett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
